Name: [center]Narrator[/center]
Text: [center]Finally a huntsman came by with his double-barreled gun on his back.[/center]

Name: [center]Narrator[/center]
Text: [center]The fox said to the wolf, Look, there comes a man. He is the one you must attack, but I am going back to my den.[/center]

Name: [center]Narrator[/center]
Text: [center]The wolf then charged at the man.[/center]
